channel.title: Rico Portfolio Template Astro
channel.description: Astro Blog Template by Rico UI

item.title: HapticWings, a Back-wearable Haptic Device
item.description: A back-wearable device enhancing the user experience of extra wings motions through dynamic 2D weight shifting

item.title: DynamicCity, a Large-scale Dynamic Urban Landscape Device
item.description: A large-scale dynamic urban landscape installation designed to simulate different three-dimensional urban forms.

item.title: BeautyEyes, an Eye Skin Care Product Design
item.description: An eye skin care product design based on the LED-excited Flexible films technique.

item.title: Petbot, a Multimodal Interactive Companion Robot
item.description: A multimodal interactive companion robot that simulates the emotional experience of a real pet.
